Name: Shawabti of Hor
Description: This shawabti of Hor holds a broad-bladed hoe against his right shoulder and another against his left. A basket for carrying sand or silt is shown on his back. The text, from right to left, invokes the shawabti as a substitute for Hor in the hereafter. The shawabti would hear the orders and obey when called to act on behalf of Hor, if Hor were required to perform any manual work in the necropolis.
